com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

Class FeatureBattery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Feature
      • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureBattery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureRandomBattery

    public class FeatureBattery
extends Feature
    Feature that will contain the battery data, this is not the standard battery since will contain more information. The information exported by this class are:
    • Battery Level, % of remaining charge with one decimal position
    • Voltage, battery voltage, in Volt with 3 decimal position
    • Current, electric current that is used by the board, with one decimal position in mA
    • Status, tell if the battery is charging, discharging or in low battery

      • extractData

        protected Feature.ExtractResult extractData(long timestamp,
                                            byte[] data,
                                            int dataOffset)
        extract the battery information from 7 byte
        Specified by:
        extractData in class Feature
        Parameters:
        data - array where read the Field data
        dataOffset - offset where start to read the data
        timestamp - data timestamp
        Returns:
        number of read byte (7) and data extracted (the battery information)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the data array has not enough data

      • readBatteryCapacity

        public boolean readBatteryCapacity()
        Send the command used for read the board battery capacity. The value will be notified with the callback FeatureBattery.FeatureBatteryListener.onCapacityRead(FeatureBattery, int)
        Returns:
        true if the command is correctly sent

      • readMaxAbsorbedCurrent

        public boolean readMaxAbsorbedCurrent()
        Send the command used for read the biggest current assorbed by the system. The value will be notified with the callback FeatureBattery.FeatureBatteryListener.onMaxAssorbedCurrentRead(FeatureBattery, float)
        Returns:
        true if the command is correctly sent
